description: Facebook is a leading social networking platform that enables people around the world to connect, communicate, and share content with ease. Users can post updates, photos, and videos, join groups, follow pages of interest, and engage with friends and communities through likes, comments, and shares. Beyond social interaction, Facebook serves as a hub for news, entertainment, business promotion, and online communities, making it a versatile tool for personal and professional networking. Its features like Messenger, Marketplace, and Events extend its functionality, creating a comprehensive digital ecosystem where people can stay informed, entertained, and socially active.
title: A social media platform to connect and share

description: Drive generally refers to a platform or service that allows users to store, access, and manage their files online. For example, Google Drive lets people save documents, photos, videos, and other files securely in the cloud, making them accessible from any device with an internet connection. Users can share files, collaborate in real-time, organize data into folders, and even work on documents together simultaneously. Drive enhances productivity by providing a centralized, safe, and convenient way to manage digital information.
title: Cloud storage to save, share

description: Snapchat is a multimedia messaging app designed for real-time sharing of photos, videos, and messages that disappear after being viewed. It allows users to communicate creatively using filters, lenses, stickers, and Bitmojis, making conversations fun and interactive. Beyond messaging, Snapchat offers Stories for sharing daily moments, Discover for news and entertainment, and Spotlight for viral short videos. Its unique feature of ephemeral content encourages spontaneous, casual communication while also providing privacy and control over shared content.
title: Share snaps and short-lived stories with friends

description: YouTube is a global video-sharing platform where users can upload, watch, and share videos on virtually any topic. It serves as a hub for entertainment, education, news, music, and live streaming, allowing creators to reach audiences worldwide. Users can subscribe to channels, like and comment on videos, create playlists, and even earn income through monetization. YouTube has transformed the way people consume media, learn new skills, and connect with communities online, making it one of the most influential platforms in the digital world.
title: Watch, upload, and share videos

description: TikTok is a social media platform focused on short-form videos, allowing users to create, share, and discover engaging content with music, effects, and filters. It’s famous for viral challenges, trends, and creative expression, letting people showcase talents, humor, and lifestyle moments in just a few seconds. TikTok’s algorithm personalizes content feeds, making it highly addictive and entertaining, while also serving as a platform for influencers, brands, and communities to connect with global audiences.
title: Create and watch short, viral videos

description: WhatsApp is a widely used messaging app that allows people to send text messages, make voice and video calls, and share photos, videos, documents, and voice notes instantly over the internet. It offers group chats, status updates, and end-to-end encryption to ensure privacy and secure communication. WhatsApp connects people globally, making it a simple, fast, and reliable platform for personal, professional, and group communication.
title: Send messages, calls, and media instantly

description: LinkedIn is a professional networking platform that helps individuals and businesses connect, share, and grow their careers or brands. Users can create professional profiles, showcase skills, post updates, share articles, and build a network of contacts in their industry. LinkedIn also offers job search, recruitment tools, learning courses, and business promotion, making it an essential platform for career development, professional networking, and industry insights.
title: Networking and career growth platform

description: Messenger is a messaging app developed by Facebook that allows users to send text messages, make voice and video calls, and share photos, videos, and files instantly. It supports group chats, reactions, stickers, and interactive features like polls and games, making conversations more fun and engaging. Messenger is designed for fast, convenient, and connected communication across personal and professional networks.
title: Chat and call with friends

description: Tinder is a popular dating app that allows users to discover, connect, and match with people nearby based on mutual interest. Using a swipe-based interface, users can like or pass on profiles, and when two users swipe right on each other, it creates a match, enabling them to chat. Tinder combines social discovery, casual dating, and relationship building, making it one of the most widely used platforms for meeting new people worldwide.
title: Organize your thoughts with smart notes

description: Video and voice calls
title: Video and voice calls.

description: imo is a messaging and video-calling app that enables users to send text messages, make voice and video calls, and share photos and videos over the internet. It supports group chats, stickers, and file sharing, making communication fast, convenient, and interactive. imo is designed to help people stay connected globally with friends, family, and colleagues in a simple and reliable way.
title: Fast, secure messaging.

description: Google Chrome is a fast, secure, and widely used web browser developed by Google. It allows users to browse the internet, access web apps, stream content, and search for information efficiently. Chrome offers features like tabbed browsing, extensions, bookmarks, synchronization across devices, and built-in security, making it a powerful and user-friendly tool for both personal and professional online activities.
title: Fast and secure web browsing.

description: Opera is a versatile web browser known for its speed, security, and built-in features like ad blocker, VPN, and battery saver. It allows users to browse the internet, access web apps, stream content, and customize their browsing experience efficiently. Opera is designed to provide a fast, private, and feature-rich browsing experience across desktops and mobile devices.
title: Lightweight browser.

description: Gmail is Google’s free email service that allows users to send, receive, and organize emails efficiently. It offers features like spam filtering, labels, search, conversation threads, attachments, and integration with Google Workspace apps. Gmail is designed to provide a secure, fast, and user-friendly platform for personal and professional communication worldwide.
title: Send, receive, and manage emails

description: bKash is a leading mobile financial service in Bangladesh that allows users to send and receive money, pay bills, recharge mobile phones, and make online payments directly from their mobile phones. It provides a secure, fast, and convenient digital banking solution for individuals and businesses, helping people manage their financial transactions without needing a traditional bank account.
title: Mobile payments and money transfers

description: Nagad is a popular mobile financial service in Bangladesh that enables users to send and receive money, pay bills, top up mobile balances, and make online payments instantly using their phones. It provides a secure, fast, and convenient digital payment solution, helping people manage financial transactions without needing a traditional bank account.
title: Fast payments and financial services

description: Dutch-Bangla Bank is a leading private commercial bank in Bangladesh that provides a wide range of banking services, including savings and current accounts, loans, debit/credit cards, online banking, and mobile banking through its innovative platforms like Rocket. DBBL is known for its modern, technology-driven approach, making banking fast, secure, and accessible for individuals and businesses across the country.
title: Mobile payments and money transfers

description: Cricbuzz is a leading cricket-focused platform that provides live scores, ball-by-ball commentary, match schedules, player stats, news, and analysis. It keeps cricket fans updated in real-time with domestic and international matches, covering all formats of the game. Cricbuzz is known for its fast, accurate, and comprehensive coverage, making it a favorite app and website for cricket enthusiasts worldwide.
title: Live cricket scores and news

description: GitHub Copilot is an AI-powered coding assistant that helps developers write code faster and smarter by providing real-time code suggestions, autocompletions, and snippets in multiple programming languages. It integrates with popular code editors like VS Code, enabling users to boost productivity, reduce errors, and learn best practices while coding. Copilot acts as a virtual pair programmer, making software development more efficient and accessible.
title: AI-powered assistant

description: Google Meet is a video conferencing platform developed by Google that allows users to host and join secure online meetings, webinars, and video calls. It supports screen sharing, real-time captions, chat, and integration with Google Workspace, making it ideal for remote work, online classes, and virtual collaboration. Google Meet is designed to provide a reliable, user-friendly, and professional communication experience for individuals and organizations worldwide.
title: Video meetings platform

description: Clash of Clans is a popular mobile strategy game where players build and upgrade their villages, train armies, and attack other players to earn resources. It features clan-based gameplay, allowing users to join forces, participate in wars, and complete cooperative challenges. With its mix of strategy, teamwork, and competitive play, Clash of Clans has become one of the most engaging and long-lasting games in the mobile gaming world.
title: A Super hiped gaming App

description: VS Code is a free, lightweight, and powerful source code editor developed by Microsoft. It supports multiple programming languages, debugging, Git integration, extensions, and customizable themes, making it a favorite tool for developers worldwide. VS Code is designed to provide a fast, efficient, and versatile coding environment, suitable for everything from web development to complex software projects.
title: Code editor for building apps

description: Firefox is a fast, secure, and privacy-focused web browser developed by Mozilla. It allows users to browse the internet, access web apps, stream content, and manage bookmarks efficiently. With features like enhanced tracking protection, extensions, and customizable interface, Firefox is designed to provide a safe, flexible, and user-friendly browsing experience across devices.
title: Fast and secure web browsing

description: Canva is an online graphic design platform that allows users to create stunning visuals, presentations, social media posts, posters, and more with ease. It provides drag-and-drop tools, templates, stock photos, and fonts, making design accessible to beginners and professionals alike. Canva empowers people to express creativity, communicate ideas, and produce professional-quality designs quickly without needing advanced design skills.
title: Design graphics, presentations

description: WinRAR is a powerful file compression and archiving software that allows users to compress, extract, and manage files in formats like RAR and ZIP. It helps reduce file size for storage or sharing, supports password protection, file splitting, and recovery options, making it a reliable tool for organizing and securing digital files efficiently.
title: Compress and extract files efficiently

description: Discord is a communication platform designed for voice, video, and text chat, primarily popular among gamers, communities, and interest-based groups. Users can create servers, join channels, share media, and collaborate with friends or communities worldwide. Discord combines real-time communication, community building, and social networking, making it a versatile hub for both casual and professional interaction.
title: Chat, voice, and community platform

description: Amazon is a global e-commerce and technology company that allows users to buy and sell products online, stream digital content, and access cloud computing services. Known for its vast product selection, fast delivery, and customer-centric approach, Amazon has transformed the way people shop, read, watch, and work online. It also offers services like Amazon Prime, AWS, and Kindle, making it a comprehensive platform for retail, entertainment, and technology solutions.
title: Online shopping platform

description: Netflix is a global streaming platform that allows users to watch movies, TV shows, documentaries, and original content anytime, anywhere. It offers personalized recommendations, ad-free viewing, and offline download options, making entertainment accessible, convenient, and tailored to individual preferences. Netflix has revolutionized the way people consume media, becoming a leading hub for on-demand video content worldwide.
title: Stream movies, TV shows, and documentaries
